cohort_definition_id.description: User Guidance: This is the identifier given to the cohort, usually by the ATLAS application

cohort_definition_name.description: User Guidance: A short description of the cohort

cohort_definition_description.description: User Guidance: A complete description of the cohort.

definition_type_concept_id.description: User Guidance: Type defining what kind of Cohort Definition the record represents and how the syntax may be executed.

cohort_definition_syntax.description: User Guidance: Syntax or code to operationalize the Cohort Definition.

subject_concept_id.description: User Guidance: This field contains a Concept that represents the domain of the subjects that are members of the cohort (e.g., Person, Provider, Visit).

cohort_initiation_date.description: User Guidance: A date to indicate when the Cohort was initiated in the COHORT table.
